channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Colton Behannon
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Colton Behannon

item.title: MLB Salary Prediction - Pitchers
item.description: Uses the stats recorded for pitchers, from 2003 to 2016, to classify their salary bracket based on their performance using several machine learning techniques. The full report

item.title: League of Legends Victory Analysis
item.description: Built a k-nearest neighbor classifier to predict the victorious team in a League of Legends match based on the first 10 minutes of gameplay. This project was completed using R. The full report

item.title: Housing Price Analysis
item.description: Built several models within SAS to come up with the best framework for estimating the real cost of a home so that no money is left on the table when selling your home. This project was completed using SAS. The full report

item.title: Python Instructional Projects
item.description: While making my way through undergrad I taught coding to hundreds of students and built up a decent set of projects for beginners to try out. I love to share these in case others might make use of them or simply want to check them out. To-Do List This project was great for getting students excited about coding by creating a relatively large project that they could actually use. This was usually the first big project after going over the basics with students.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Feel free to connect with me below. Platform URL LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/coltonbehannon/ GitHub: https://github.com/coltonbehannon Email: colton.behannon@gmail.com
